sentences.sContent: Lose yourself in the play. Be a dinosaur, or a gorilla, or a villain.
sentences.sContent_eng: Lose yourself in the play. Be a dinosaur, or a gorilla, or a villain.
sentences.sCn: 放下自己的架子，扮演一只恐龙，或者是大猩猩，甚至是一个坏蛋。

sentences.sContent: In fact, he found that there was scarcely any information on gorilla cognition at all.
sentences.sContent_eng: In fact, he found that there was scarcely any information on gorilla cognition at all.
sentences.sCn: 事实上，他发现任何有关大猩猩认知的信息都非常稀少。

sentences.sContent: The most famous albino animal of all was Snowflake the gorilla, who lived at Barcelona Zoo from 1966 until his death from skin cancer in 2003.
sentences.sContent_eng: The most famous albino animal of all was Snowflake the gorilla, who lived at Barcelona Zoo from 1966 until his death from skin cancer in 2003.
sentences.sCn: 最著名的白化动物是大猩猩雪花。 自1966年以来，他一直生活在巴塞罗纳动物园，直到2003年死于皮肤癌。

trans.tranOther: a very large African monkey that is the largest of the  apes
